name: Klock: The Trials of Time (Mitchel Bloch)
name_original: Klock: The Trials of Time (Mitchel Bloch)
description:
Taking inspiration from many classic platformers of the 16-bit era, “Klock: The Trials of Time” has you fight, solve puzzles, and traverse through a constantly changing world. Mastering Klock’s unique ability to control spacetime will be the key to him not only making it through this legendary journey successfully, but also the only way that he can fix history and keep balance in the universe; so that he may fulfill the prophecy of the legendary Child of Time.

This is a early demo made for a class in the Game Development program at Ontario Tech University.

If a platform seems to be missing press ALT to reload level this is a known bug, and if it just seems stuck spam time slow this fixes it like 90% of the time

Game Design/Level Design
